main event: Sighting of a strange hovering thing or object which appeared to be giving off multicolored lights, and Russian air base personnel at the Teheran airport witnessed an aerial object which appeared to interfere with the operation of jet engines on a number of planes. The object also gave off multicolored lights. Later, an unidentified flying object was tracked on radar.
interesting points: The object appeared to be giving off multicolored lights.
The object interfered with the operation of jet engines on a number of planes.
An unidentified flying object was later tracked on radar.
An unidentified aircraft was observed flying from the north to south passing over Rasht, Iran.
A man with a bright shining thing observed this object on July 26, 1957.
sighted object: a strange hovering thing or object giving off multicolored lights, and an unidentified flying object tracked on radar
witnesses: Russian air base personnel and a man with a bright shining thing
